title: Best of The Herd: 10/26/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 10/26/2018
description:
Colin says that Deshaun Watson is what a number 1 pick should look like even though he wasn't one. Baker Mayfield is not what the top pick should look like even though he was. He thinks Lonzo Ball has done something very difficult to do in the NBA that many players have failed to do. Plus, former Bears and Dolphins Head Coach Dave Wannstedt talks about the mess in Oakland and why Jerry Jones will give Dak a lot of time to succeed 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
